Html:
I'm sitting here thinking about how to create a help file for the controls and how much work it is. I wish someone would pick up development of NDoc. I loved how easy it was to create VS 2003 help files with it. I think I read that the original developers health had failed.

Does anyone know of any equivalent that works with VS 2005 ?

Thank you

I'll give it a try. Help files are so important but just so much work.
